newsitems.title: RPS Community Update: What You Did in Dirt Rally, Europa Universalis, Terraria, Trove And More!
newsitems.author: contact@rockpapershotgun.com (Scott Constantine)
newsitems.contents: September was absolutely packed full of games in the RPS community, with events taking place in Dirt Rally , Europa Universalis , Guild Wars 2 , Terraria , Trove and more! Want to know what happened and how you can get involved? Read on! …

newsitems.title: RPS Community Update: What You Did in Dirt Rally, Rocket League, Terraria and Others!
newsitems.author: contact@rockpapershotgun.com (Scott Constantine)
newsitems.contents: August was a busy month for the RPS community, with action seen in Dirt Rally , Rocket League , Terraria and others – including Awesomenauts , Natural Selection 2 and Killing Floor . Click on for information about each, along with how you can get involved. …
